column3: aber a ɔman no nyinara wiee Jordan twa no
column6: "Hom nyiyi ɔman no mu mbanyin duebien
column10: Hom mfa abo duebien wɔ Jordan mu wɔ mbrɛ asɔfo no hɔn anan gyinaa pintsinn no
column13: mbrɛ hom bɔsoɛ anadwe yi no."

column2: "Nna Josua frɛɛ mbanyin duebien no a oesiesie hɔn wɔ Israelmba no mu no

column3: Hom ntwa mu nkedzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no enyim nkɔ Jordan ne finimfin
column4: na hom mu nyimpa baako biara mfa ɔbo kor nto no kɔn ho
column5: dɛ mbrɛ Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw no dodow tse:"

column3: na sɛ ndaamba bi hom mba bisa hom dɛ
column4: Abo yi hom kyerɛ ase dɛn a
column7: Osiandɛ Jordan nsu no twae wɔ EWURADZE ahyɛmudaka no enyim; aber a ahyɛmudaka no twaa Jordan no
column10: otwaa koraa: na abo yi na ɔyɛ nkaadze ma Israelmba daa."

column2: "Na Israelmba no yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Josua hyɛe no
column3: na wɔfaa abo duebien wɔ Jordan mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Josua no
column5: dɛ mbrɛ Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw no dodow tse; na wɔsoae dze kɔr beebi mbrɛ wɔkɔsoɛe no

column2: "Na Josua so dze abo duebien sisii Jordan finimfin
column3: wɔ beebi mbrɛ asɔfo a wɔso ahyɛmudaka no dze hɔn anan sisii no: na ɔwɔ hɔ dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na asɔfo a wɔso adaka no gyinaa Jordan mu araa ma okodur dɛ wowiee adze biara a EWURADZE hyɛɛ Josua dɛ ɔnka nkyerɛ ɔman no yɛ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Moses dze hyɛɛ Josua no nyinara: na ɔman no yɛɛ ntsɛm twae."
aber a ɔman no nyinara wiee twa no
column4: na EWURADZE n'adakaa no so twae
column5: na asɔfo no kedzii ɔman no enyim."
miae twae kedzii Israelmba no enyim
column6: dɛ mbrɛ Moses kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn no:"

column2: "mbarimba bɛyɛ mpemeduanan a woemia prɛko dɛ wɔrokɔ sa twae kedzii EWURADZE enyim kɔr akono
"Da no ara na EWURADZE maa Josua do wɔ Israel nyinara enyi do; na wosuroo no
column4: wɔ no nkwa nda nyinara mu."

column3: asɔfo a wɔso EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka no fi Jordan mu fowee
column4: na asɔfo no hɔn anamɔn besii daadze kɛsɛɛ do ara
column5: na Jordan no nsu no sanee kɔr n'anamu
column6: na ɔkɛkataa no nsukɔn nyinara do
column7: dɛ mbrɛ nkan no nna ɔtse no."

column2: "Na ɔman no fii Jordan mu fowee wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no mu da a otsia du no mu
column4: wɔ Jeriko no boka afamu ɔhe do."

column2: "Na abo duebien no a woyiyii no wɔ Jordan mu no
column3: Josua dze hyɛɛ siw wɔ Gilgal."

column4: Sɛ ndaamba bi hom mba bisa hɔn egyanom dɛ
column5: Abo yi ase nye dɛn a
column8: hom mma hom mba nhu dɛ
column9: Asaase kɛsɛɛ do na Israel nam twaa Jordan yi."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn weew Jordan mu nsu no wɔ hom enyim
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn yɛɛ Mbɛw Po (Mbɛw Po) no a ɔwewee no wɔ hɛn enyim

column2: "ama asaase do aman nyinara eehu dɛ EWURADZE n'abasa mu yɛ dzen; ama hom eesuro EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn daa."
